Milestone 7: CLI
description:
Wire everything together with a proper CLI interface.

Files: src/main.rs, src/cli.rs
Dependencies: clap

Subcommands:
- scan <path> — detect and report (no modifications)
- quarantine <path> — move duplicates to quarantine
- restore [--all | <id>] — restore from quarantine
- purge — permanently delete quarantined files
- status — show quarantine contents

Testing:
- End-to-end tests with assert_cmd crate
- Create test directory, run CLI, verify output
- Test error handling and edge cases
- Manual testing on real iCloud directories

CLI glue — end-to-end tests verify full pipeline.
